title: Emigre Tarzana Applications
content:
Hi.   
   
I want to use Zuzana's Tarzana on a corporate ID. Does anyone know any good aplication of this type? Yves, you also love this font, anything for me on this?
author: adriano

comments.content:
I like orbitz.com - or have moved away from Tarzana?   
   
hhp

I guess they moved away from it. I can only see a Vegas banner with Tarzana ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222150im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) I'll also do the site, but I'm mainly interested on Tarzana on print (italics and regular).

The identity for the 2000 "National Design Triennial: Design Culture Now" used tarzana quite well as the main signature typeface. It really capitalized on the 3 like form of the uppercase "E" The website for it can be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222150/http:/ndm.si.edu/triennial/triennial.html).   
(it is also used it in the animated intro [page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222150/http:/ndm.si.edu/triennial/animation.html))   
   
The book that accompanied the exhibition also used Tarzana. The book is called "Design Culture Now: National Design Triennial" you can have a closer look at the book on [amazon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222150/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/1568982151/ref=pd_sim_books_2/102-6103632-2921754?v=glance&s=books)
Adriano, if you can get CVS products you will see a good use of Tarzana. Maybe at their website they have pictures.
